data.name: The Big Dish
data.message: Bravo! Cucina Italiana & Work at BRAVO is proud to support The Big Dish with a Chef's Dinner at tonight's raffle & offer sponsorship for Ohio State Hospitality Management students! Cheers to a fabulous event!
data.description:
The Big Dish is Finally here!!!! Remember the event is taking place at the Mershon Auditorium on Campus! The event begins with networking at 5:30 PM and the program begins at 7 PM. We are so excited to have all of you support our event! We look forward to seeing you tonight!

Mershon Auditorium
1871 North High Street
Columbus, OH 43210
adjacent to the Wexner Center building
